translation.headerText: DevOps engineers who professionally solve infrastructure problems for the teams of developers
translation.do_item_3: Set up monitoring, collection systems and application metrics
translation.do_item_4: Pay special attention to security issues and achieve compliance with HIPAA, GDPR and other standards
translation.do_item_7: Consult and advise on the choice of appropriate tools
translation.title_3: We work with 15 large international projects. Most of them have been operating under high load in production for more than 10 years.
